task: Parse an AWS S3 bucket name from a full S3 URI (e.g., 's3://my-bucket-name/path/to/file.txt') and extract only the bucket name
solution_criteria: Must correctly extract bucket names from various S3 URI formats, handle URIs with and without trailing paths, and account for bucket naming rules (lowercase, hyphens, numbers)

task: Create a JSON configuration object for an AWS Lambda function that includes environment variables, memory allocation, timeout, and a basic IAM role ARN
solution_criteria: JSON must be valid, include required Lambda configuration fields (FunctionName, Runtime, Handler, Role, Timeout, MemorySize), contain at least 2 environment variables, and follow AWS Lambda CloudFormation or API schema

task: Write a Python function that validates an AWS IAM role ARN string and returns True if valid, False otherwise
solution_criteria: Function must validate ARN format (arn:aws:iam::account-id:role/role-name), check account ID is numeric, ensure role name contains only valid characters, and handle edge cases like empty strings
